page.title: 12 The Sidings Restauraunt
page.content: On the 1st of July 1985 a new restaurant opened in Shipton.Its unusual because its made out of railway carrages.The owner Mr.B. Gemmell was once chief passenger manager for British Rail and is very interested in trains.When he retired he decided to build The Sidings.As Mr Gemmel and his chief chef are Scottish there is a Scottish taste to the menu.The passengers will be able to taste dishes like{grilled loch tay {salmon,Cullen skink a Scottish soup.}A three course meal would cost Â£7.00.The diners will dine in the coaches decorated chocolate,cream,gold.They will be served by waitresses dressed in the same colour Two of the coaches are made into 8 bedrooms.1 for the disabled and a bridal suit.The restaurant is good for train spotting because its next to the railway.
